main.name: Raahil Amarshi
main.description: A quick and curious learner who enjoys solving complex technical problems and communicating the power of technical solutions. Reach out to me if you are in need of a problem-solver and an effective communicator.
main.bio: Tanzanian born and raised, I am a professional cricket player, engineer and an aspiring techno-preneur. In everything that I do, I bring with me a sense of discipline, open-mindedness, and joyful curiosity.

resume.skillmessage: Below is a brief display of my well-rounded skill set.

education.degree: B.S in Industrial & Systems Engineering, Minor in Business
education.description: This was the birthplace of my problem-solving skills. I graduated with High Honors and a some leadership awards - Check out my LinkedIn for a detailed list.

work.title: Application Engineer
work.description: Lead teams of up to 6 to deliver web applications from start to finish within as little as 4 months. Present and teach solutions architecture to technical and non-technical audiences as large as 20 people

work.title: Technical Implementation Engineer
work.description: Leverage React.js and REST APIs to build scalable and efficient web applications for clients in financial markets. Interact closely with clients to understand their business and present technical solutions using our tech stack. Earned the Unqork SME certification.

testimonials.text: ...I was particularly impressed with how well Raahil was able to receive and implement feedback. He is also quick to mentor others, sharing his knowledge and expertise to lift up his team members around him. Raahil would be an asset to any team.
...He listens, he asks questions, and he is always eager to learn. Anyone would be lucky to have him on their team.
testimonials.user: Tony Shapiro-Bey - Senior Application Engineer at Unqork.

testimonials.text: ...I am impressed by all the thorough presentations he provided both internally and externally articulating new features that he built. Raahil has that rare ability to both dive into the details of how a specific feature works but also adapt his pitch to any audience and tie that to business values...
